product_data.title: YOUTHQUAKE Women's Net Embroidered Full Size Dupatta With 4 Side Golden Lace
reviews: The media could not be loaded.
Very beautiful and good quality exact as shown in picture
Wanted a light pink one as the picture showed. But what I received was very very dark pink.
Color is quite good dark one, worth in this range . Small booti allover with broad boarder.
I bought it to design but all golden sequence are falling down and in the middle I find there is plain net no embroidery has been done. Very bad experience. Not recommend at all.
